prompt_base: athletic Chinese interpol officer, muscular legs, determined focused expression, black ox-horn buns with white silk ribbons, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, visible muscle definition, individual hair strands, realistic blue silk brocade qipao fabric, intricate gold trims, sharp focus
